actions.name: Intrepid Sword
actions.description: The user's default ATK stage is +1. At the start of combat, or when switched in, the user raises their ATK stage by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Water Absorb
actions.description: The user takes no damage from the attack and is unaffected by the attack effects. Then the user recovers 1/4 of their Max HP.

actions.name: Prankster
actions.description: The user's Status-category attacks have their Priority, Interrupt and Delay level increased by +1. The user's Status-category attacks that do not have a Priority, Interrupt or Delay Action are considered [Priority 1] actions.

actions.name: Magician
actions.description: The user steals one equipped Accessory or Belt slot item from the target. The user must have an empty equipment slot to use this ability.

actions.name: Drizzle
actions.description: Connection - Rain Dance. When using Rain Dance, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have the weather become (T2 Rain) for 5 rounds instead of Rainy Weather.

actions.name: Shadow Tag
actions.description: All enemy creatures within 3m of the user are Stuck and Slowed.

actions.name: Pickpocket
actions.description: Connection - Thief. When using the attack Thief, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to steal the targets Held Item. Items stolen with thief are now added to the user's inventory instead of being dropped on the ground if the user's equip slots are full. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the stolen items are thrown towards their trainer as a Free Action.

actions.name: Electric Surge
actions.description: Connection - Electric Terrain. When using Electric Terrain, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to increase the number of rounds Electric Terrain persists by 2.

actions.name: Poison Point
actions.description: When the user is hit by a attack that makes contact, the attacking creature has a 30% chance of gaining Poison 5.

actions.name: Tangled Feet
actions.description: If the user is affected by the Confused condition, their default EVA is +2.

actions.name: Mold Breaker
actions.description: The user's attacks are unaffected by the effects of [Defensive] abilities.

actions.name: Stamina
actions.description: The user's DEF stage is increased by +1 for 2 activations.

actions.name: Commander
actions.description: At the start of battle, or when switched in, Tatsugiri transforms into a Belt Item for Dodonzo, altering the effect of Order Up. An equipped Tatsugiri is unable to perform any actions besides the Free Action of this ability. When equipped to a Dodonzo whose HP is less than 1/2 their Max HP, Tatsugiri sets it's HP to 0 and increases Dodonzo's ATK stage, DEF stage, SPATK stage, SPDEF stage, and Speed stage by +2 for 5 activations as a Free Action. If Dodonzo faints while equipped with an Active Tatsugiri, Tatsugiri is brought out onto the field in an open space adjacent to Dodonzo. This ability can only be used once per combat.

actions.name: White Smoke
actions.description: A 2m smoky cloud emanates from the user. Any creature within the cloud has +1 EVA Stage. The user is immune to Negative Stage Change effects.

actions.name: Weak Armor
actions.description: The user loses -1 DEF stage and gains +1 Speed stage for 5 activations.

actions.name: Iron Barbs
actions.description: When the user is hit by a contact attack, the attacker takes a Tick of HP damage.

actions.name: Pure Power
actions.description: The user's Physical-category attacks have 25% more Power.

actions.name: Turboblaze
actions.description: The user's attacks are unaffected by the abilities of other creatures on the field. When using Fusion Flare, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to also inflict Nullified 5 on one of the target's abilities. If the user uses Blue Flare, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to inflict Nullified 5 on one of the target's abilities as well as inflicting Blinded 5.

actions.name: Shell Armor
actions.description: The user is immune to Critical Hits, and attacks with secondary effects that target the user deal reduced 30% damage.

actions.name: Magic Bounce
actions.description: The triggering attack fails to hit the user, and the attacking creature is instead targeted and hit with the triggering attack, applying the effects to themself.

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Status-category attack.

actions.name: Dauntless Shield
actions.description: The user's default DEF stage is +1. At the start of combat, or when switched in, the user raises their DEF stage by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Cheek Pouch
actions.description: Whenever you consume a [Food] item, you also recover HP equal to 1/3 your Max HP in addition to the [Food] item's effect.

actions.name: Slow Start
actions.description: The user's default ATK and Speed stage are -4. After each of the user's activations, the user's default ATK and Speed stage increase by 1. After combat or upon Fainting, the user's default ATK and Speed stage reset to -4.

actions.name: Sap Sipper
actions.description: The user takes no damage from the triggering attack, and the triggering attack's effects are not applied. Then the user's ATK stage is raised by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Protosynthesis
actions.description: While Sunny weather is active, the user's highest Stat, excluding HP, is increased by 30%, or 50% if the stat is Speed. This is before stat changes from stage, Conditions and Items. If the user has an equipped Booster Energy, Protosynthesis can be activated for 5 activations once per combat.

actions.name: Simple
actions.description: CS changing effects affecting the user have double the strength and duration. Note: This also counts for Negative stage changes.

actions.name: Healer
actions.description: The user and allied creatures within 5m reduce the duration of Major Status Conditions they gain by 1 activation. Major Status conditions will always apply a minimum of 1 activation duration regardless of this effect.

actions.name: Illusion
actions.description: At the start of combat, or when switched in, the user is Disguised. While Disguised, the user's default EVA stage is 1. If the user is hit by an attack the Disguise is broken.

actions.name: Steelworker
actions.description: All of the creatures damaging attacks are [Delay 3] actions and have 50% increased power.

actions.name: Victory Star
actions.description: The user and allies within 10m have their attack ACC increased by 20%. When using V-Create, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to add the [Crit 2] trait to the attack. When rolling to increase Luck at the end of a session, the user rolls a d10 twice and keeps the better result. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the Trainer gets an additional d6 roll for Luck instead.

actions.name: Transform Zero
actions.description: All current [Weather] and [Terrain] effects end. Creatures on the field that have undergone a Phenomenal Transformation other than Terastalization have those Transformations ended.

actions.name: Infiltrator
actions.description: At the start of combat, or when switched in, the user is Disguised. While Disguised, the user's default EVA stage is 1. If the user is hit with an attack, the Disguise is broken.

actions.name: Steadfast
actions.description: While the user is affected by the Flinched condition, their default SPD stage is increased to +2.

actions.name: Leaf Guard
actions.description: While Sunny Weather is active, the user is immune to the effects of Major Status Conditions inflicted by other creatures.

actions.name: Bulletproof
actions.description: Your are immune to the damage and effects of [Explode] and [Missile] attacks.

actions.name: Forewarn
actions.description: The user is considered to have +1 EVA stage for attacks that deal Super-effective damage that target the user.

actions.name: Suction Cups
actions.description: The user is immune to the [Push] effect and cannot be affected by any forced movement. The user's Climb skill checks have one more degree of success.

actions.name: Flower Veil
actions.description: Allied Grass-type creatures within 5m of the user are immune to Negative stage effects.

actions.name: Gorilla Tactics
actions.description: The user's ATK stat is increased by 50%. Whenever the user uses an attack, that attack is Choice-Locked for 5 activations.

actions.name: Triage
actions.description: The user's [Healing] attacks can be used as [Priority 3] actions.

actions.name: Effect Spore
actions.description: When the user is hit by a contact attack, the attacking creature rolls has a 30% chance of either being Paralysis 5, given Drowsy 5, or gaining Poison 5.

actions.name: Berserk
actions.description: While your current HP is less than 1/2 your Max HP, your default SPATK stage is increased by +1.

actions.name: Grim Neigh
actions.description: The user gains +1 SPATK stage for 5 activations. If more than one creature Faints due to a single action from the user, this ability only activates once.

actions.name: Natural Cure
actions.description: When the user is switched out, they are cured of all Major Status Conditions affecting them.

actions.name: Multiscale
actions.description: While at Full HP, all incoming damage is reduced by 50%. This does not affect set damage.

actions.name: Hydration
actions.description: While Rainy Weather is active, Major Status Conditions affecting the user tick down by 2 every activation instead of 1.

actions.name: Guard Dog
actions.description: The user's ATK is increased by +1 for 5 activations. Passive: The user cannot be Pushed, but will still be affected by damage and other effects of Push actions.

actions.name: Electromorphosis
actions.description: The user freely uses Charge at [Interrupt 4].

actions.name: Rocky Payload
actions.description: Increases the power of the user's Rock-type attacks by 50%.

actions.name: Wandering Spirit
actions.description: When the user is hit by a contact, the attacker takes a Tick of HP damage.

actions.name: Ice Scales
actions.description: The user takes 50% reduced damage from Special-category attacks.

actions.name: Wind Rider
actions.description: The user takes no damage and is unaffected by the triggering attacks effect. Then the user's ATK Stage increases by +1 for 5 activations. While Windy Weather is active, the user's default ATK Stage is +1.

actions.name: Klutz
actions.description: The user's Fling Power for throwable items is increased by 20%, but the Fling ACC of throwable items is reduced by 20%.

actions.name: Illuminate
actions.description: The user is immune to Negative ACC stage effects. The user ignores a target's Positive EVA stage when attacking.

actions.name: Storm Drain
actions.description: The triggering attack hits the user instead, dealing no damage and applying no effects. Additionally, the user raises their SPATK stage by +1 for 2 activations.

cost.trigger: A creature within 10m of the user uses a Water-type attack.

actions.name: Wonder Guard
actions.description: The user takes no damage from attacks that are not super-effective. The user gains Weary 4 whenever it Faints.

actions.name: Serene Grace
actions.description: If the user uses an attack or has an equipped item that requires rolling a save, the save is rolled twice and the worst result is used for enemy creature rolls, the best result is used for the user's roll. Note: Saves are a flat d100 roll with a success being under the DC. An enemy will keep the higher of the two rolls while the user keeps the lower of the two.

actions.name: Costar
actions.description: Select 1 allied creature on the field and copy all stage-changing effects they have.

actions.name: Sword of Ruin
actions.description: All other creatures have their DEF stat reduced by 25%. This reduction happens before any stage changes.

actions.name: Protean
actions.description: Before applying damage, the user's Type changes to the Type of the triggering attack. The user remains as the transformed type for 5 activations, or until switched out or Fainted. Protean can only be used once per combat.

actions.name: Magic Guard
actions.description: The user is immune to damage from Conditions, attack effects and equipped item effects.

actions.name: Sturdy
actions.description: Connection - Endure. When using Endure as an Interrupt action, the user can spend 2 additional AP to prevent their HP from falling below 1/2 their Max HP for the triggering attack.

actions.name: Super Luck
actions.description: The user's default Critical Hit stage is +1. When rolling to increase Luck at the end of a session, the user rolls a d10 twice and keeps the better result. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the Trainer gets an additional d6 roll for Luck instead.

actions.name: Power of Alchemy
actions.description: The user copies 1 Ability a Fainted allied creature has and replaces Power of Alchemy with it for the rest of combat. Copied abilities with a Trigger that requires the user to switch in activate with this effect. [Legendary] and [Forme-Change] abilities cannot be copied.

actions.name: Slush Rush
actions.description: The user's Speed stat is doubled in Snowy Weather. The user is immune to the negative effects of Snowy Weather.

actions.name: Flare Boost
actions.description: While the user is affected by Burn, the Power of their Special-category attacks is increased by 50%

actions.name: Toxic Debris
actions.description: Connection - Toxic Spikes. The user uses Toxic Spikes immediately as a Free Action. When using Toxic Spikes, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have the attack effect immediately apply to any creatures in the Blast area.

actions.name: Immunity
actions.description: The user is immune to the Poison and Blight condition. The user also resists Poison-type damage one step further.

actions.name: Guts
actions.description: The user's ATK stat increases by 50% if affected by a Major Status Condition. If the user has Burn, they do not get the Enfeebled condition.

actions.name: Queenly Majesty
actions.description: The triggering attack fails to activate and is Disabled 5 if it was an attack, or Nullified 5 if it was an ability.

cost.trigger: Another creature uses a Priority or Interrupt Action.

actions.name: Imposter
actions.description: Connection - Transform. The user uses the attack Transform immediately. This cannot be interrupted. When using Transform, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to double the duration of Transform.

actions.name: Sand Stream
actions.description: Connection - Sandstorm. When the using Sandstorm, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have the weather become (T2 Sandy) for 5 rounds instead of Sandy Weather.

actions.name: Ice Face
actions.description: The user starts battle in Ice Face Forme and the first Physical-category attack that hits the user fails to hit. Then the user changes to Noice Face forme. If Snowy Weather is active and the user is in Noice Face forme, the user can change to Ice Face forme using a Simple Action.

actions.name: Download
actions.description: At the start of battle, or when switched in, the user targets one other creature on the field. If the targeted creature's DEF stat is higher than its SPDEF, the user raises their SPATK stage by +1 for 5 activations. If the targeted creature's DEF stat is lower than its SPDEF Stat, the user raises their ATK stage by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Static
actions.description: When the user is hit by a attack that makes contact, the attacking creature has a 30% chance of becoming Paralysis 5.

actions.name: Gluttony
actions.description: The user can equip two additional [Food] items as Belt items, and can consume equipped [Food] items as a Free Action while their health is lower than 1/2 their Max HP

actions.name: Mega Launcher
actions.description: The power of the user's [Pulse] attacks is increased by 50%.

actions.name: Chilling Neigh
actions.description: Your ATK stage is increased by +1 for 5 activations. If more than one creature Faints due to a single action from the user, this effect only activates once.

actions.name: Cud Chew
actions.description: Whenever you consume a [Food] item, at the end of your next activation gain the Effect of that [Food] item a second time.

actions.name: Limber
actions.description: The user is immune to the Paralysis condition. The user auto-succeeds on an escape check for the Grappled condition.

actions.name: Plus
actions.description: If there is at least one other allied creature with the Minus, Cationic or Anionic ability on the field, the user's ATK stat is increased by 50%. If the user is within 5m of an ally with the Minus, Cationic, or Anionic Ability, they gain the effect of that ability.

actions.name: Stakeout
actions.description: The user's attacks will have double power against creatures who have switched in before the end of the round. This does not count for a creature that was switched in to replace a Fainted creature.

actions.name: Sniper
actions.description: The user's Critical Hit damage is increased by 50%. The user's Range Increment Penalty is -1 for all ranged attacks.

actions.name: Cloud Nine
actions.description: The triggering attack fails to activate and becomes Disabled 5.

cost.trigger: A creature on the field uses a [Weather] attack.

actions.name: Adaptability
actions.description: Adaptability increases the effectiveness of STAB attacks from the usual 1.5× to 2×.

actions.name: Justified
actions.description: The user's ATK stage is increased by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Aura Break
actions.description: Suppresses the effects of other creatures' [Aura] attacks and abilities on the field, and reduces the Power of attacks made by creatures with [Aura] abilties by 25%.

actions.name: Wonder Skin
actions.description: Incoming Status-category attacks against the user have half ACC.

actions.name: Speed Boost
actions.description: When using the Dash action, the mount of extra movement allowance the user gains is doubled.

actions.name: Marvel Scale
actions.description: While the user is affected by a Major Status Condition, the user's DEF stat is increased by 50%

actions.name: Primordial Sea
actions.description: When the user is active on the field, the Weather is changed to (T3 Rainy). This weather persists while the user with this ability is active. When the user faints or switches out the weather will change to (T2 Rainy) for 5 rounds.

actions.name: Quark Drive
actions.description: While Electric Terrain is active, the user's highest Stat, excluding HP, is increased by 30%, or 50% if the stat is Speed. This is before stat changes from stage, Conditions and Items. If the user has an equipped Booster Energy, Quark Drive can be activated for 5 activations once per combat.

actions.name: Thick Fat
actions.description: The user takes 50% reduced damage from Fire and Ice-type attacks.

actions.name: Mirror Armor
actions.description: The user does not gain the effect and the triggering creature gains it instead with double the duration.

cost.trigger: Another creature applies a Negative stage effect to the user.

actions.name: Soul-Heart
actions.description: The user gains +1 SPATK stage for 5 activations. When using Fleur Cannon, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to add the [Exhaust] trait for that attack instead of losing -2 SPATK stage.

actions.name: Battle Bond
actions.description: You change into your Battle Bond Forme.

actions.name: Regenerator
actions.description: When the user is switched out, or at the end of a battle, the user recovers 1/3 of their Max HP.

actions.name: Unnerve
actions.description: Other creatures within 10m of the user cannot consume [Food] items.

actions.name: Reckless
actions.description: The user's [Crash] and [Recoil] attacks have 20% increased power.

actions.name: Battle Armor
actions.description: The user is protected from Critical Hits. If the user were to take Critical Hit damage, they take normal damage instead. The user also takes 30% less damage from contact attacks.

actions.name: Unseen Fist
actions.description: The user's contact attacks ignore [Shield] attack effects.

actions.name: Corrosion
actions.description: Your Status-category attacks that apply the Poison and Blight condition can now affect Steel and Poison-typed creatures. Your non Poison-typed attacks that apply Poison and Blight can apply these conditions to Steel and Poison-typed creatures.

actions.name: Moody
actions.description: At the end of the user's activations, the user rolls 2d8. The first d8 sets the default stage of the rolled stat by +2. The second d8 sets the default stage of the rolled stat to -1. These change each time this ability activates. 1- ATK, 2- DEF, 3- SPATK, 4- SPDEF, 5- Speed, 6- ACC, 7- EVA, 8- User Choice.

actions.name: Libero
actions.description: Before applying damage, the user's Type changes to a Type that resists the incoming attack, then reduces the damage by a further 50%. The user remains as the transformed type for 5 activations, or until switched out or Fainted. Libero can only be used once per combat.

actions.name: Purifying Salt
actions.description: Major and Minor Status Conditions applied to the user have half their duration. The user takes 50% reduced damage from incoming Ghost-type attacks.

actions.name: Armor Tail
actions.description: The triggering Priority Action fails to hit you, and additional Priority Actions that hit you also fail to hit you and your allies within 8m of you until your next activation, or when the round ends, whichever is first. Priority Actions failing to hit you do not activate on-miss effects.

cost.trigger: You, or an allied creature within 8m of you, is hit by a [Priority] Action.

actions.name: Tangling Hair
actions.description: If the user is hit by a contact move, the attacking creature loses -1 Speed stage for 3 activations.

actions.name: No Guard
actions.description: All of the user's attacks cannot miss. All incoming attacks to the user cannot miss. This does not affect RIP.

actions.name: Sand Spit
actions.description: Connection - Sand ATK Trigger: The user is hit by an attack. Effect: The user uses Sand ATK on the attacking creature, and the attack is rerolled. The rerolled attack does not cost additional PP nor further triggers Sand Spit. When using Sand ATK, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have it deal Ground-type damage with 25 power.

actions.name: Oblivious
actions.description: [Social] attack and ability effects affecting the user has their duration reduced by 2 instead of 1 at the end of each of the user's activations.

actions.name: Frisk
actions.description: The user learns of one item the attack target has equipped, including details about the item and amount if applicable.

actions.name: Cotton Down
actions.description: The attacking creature, and all other creatures within 3m of you, lose -1 SPD stage for 5 activations.

actions.name: Beast Boost
actions.description: Your highest stat increases by +1 stage for 5 activations. If your highest stats are tied, you choose which one gets the boost. If more than one creature Faints due to a single action from the user, this effect only activates once.

actions.name: Aftermath
actions.description: Connection - Self-Destruct.\nThe user freely uses Self-Destruct, as [Interrupt 6]. If using Self-Destruct, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to instead take damage equal to 1/2 their Max HP on resolving Self-Destruct instead of Fainting.

actions.name: Grass Pelt
actions.description: While Grassy Terrain is active, the user's DEF Stat is increased by 50%.

actions.name: Curious Medicine
actions.description: When the user is switched into battle, all allies stage is reset to default value (usually 0)

actions.name: Steam Engine
actions.description: After damage is applied, the user's Speed stage increases by +3 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Drought
actions.description: Connection - Sunny Day. When using Sunny Day, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have the weather become (T2 Sun) for 5 rounds instead of Sunny Weather.

actions.name: As One
actions.description: During Camp, Calyrex can fuse or unfuse with either Glastrier or Spectrier to change Formes.

actions.name: Ripen
actions.description: The healing effects of equipped Natural [Food] items are doubled for the user. As a Camp Action, the user can convert any equipped Natural [Food] items into ripened versions, doubling their effects. Ripened [Food] items are not affected further by this ability.

actions.name: Shields Down
actions.description: While the user's HP is higher than 1/2 their Max HP, the user is in Meteor Forme. While in Meteor Forme, the user is immune to Status conditions. When the user's HP is less than 1/2 their Max HP, they change to Core Forme. While in Core Forme, the user is unaffected by Negative stage effects.

actions.name: Minus
actions.description: If there is at least one other allied creature with the Plus, Cationic or Anionic ability on the field, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50%. If the user is within 5m of an ally with the Plus, Cationic, or Anionic Ability, they gain the effect of that ability.

actions.name: Orichalcum Pulse
actions.description: At the start of combat, or when the user switches in, the weather is changed to Sunny Weather and remains while the user is active on the field. Additionally, the user's ATK stat increases by 33% while Sunny Weather is active. If the user uses Collision Course while in Sunny Weather, their Speed stage increases by +1 for 2 activations. If the user Faints or is switched out, current active Sunny Weather lasts 5 rounds.

actions.name: Soundproof
actions.description: The user is immune to the damage and effects of [Sonic] moves.

actions.name: Tough Claws
actions.description: The user's contact attacks have 30% increased power.

actions.name: Rough Skin
actions.description: When the user is hit by a contact attack, the attacker takes a Tick of HP damage.

actions.name: Cute Charm
actions.description: When the user is hit by damaging contact attack, the attacking creature has a 30% chance of being Charmed 5.

actions.name: Earth Eater
actions.description: When the user is hit by a damaging Ground-type attack, the user recovers 1/4 of their Max HP instead of taking damage.

actions.name: Keen Eye
actions.description: The user is immune to Negative ACC stage effects. When the user gains a Positive ACC stage effect, the duration is increased by 1 activation.

actions.name: Delta Stream
actions.description: When the user is active on the field, the Weather is changed to Windstorm (T3 Windy). This weather persists while the user with this ability is active. When the user faints or switches out the weather will change to (T2 Windy) for 5 rounds.

actions.name: Zero to Hero
actions.description: Connection - Flip Turn. The user transforms into their Hero Forme when they are Switched In until the end of combat or when the user Faints. When using Flip Turn, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to transform into their Hero Forme for 5 activations. Zero to Hero cannot activate if the user is Weary.

actions.name: Tablets of Ruin
actions.description: All other creatures have their ATK stat reduced by 25%. This reduction happens before any stage changes.

actions.name: Sand Veil
actions.description: While Sandy Weather is active, all incoming attacks against the user have 20% reduced ACC. The user is immune to the negative effects of Sandy Weather.

actions.name: Seed Sower
actions.description: Connection - Leech Seed Trigger: The user is hit by a move. Effect: The user uses Leech Seed on the attacking creature. When using Leech Seed, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have Leech Seed also apply Bound 5.

actions.name: Stall
actions.description: All of the creatures damaging attacks are [Delay 3] actions and have 50% increased power.

actions.name: Unburden
actions.description: When the user consumes an equipped item, their SPD Stat doubles for 5 activations. Additional uses of this ability only refreshes the duration of the effect.

actions.name: Thermal Exchange
actions.description: Trigger: The user is hit by a Fire-type attack. Effect: The user's ATK stage increases by +1 for 3 activations. The user is immune to the @Affliction[burn] condition.

actions.name: Shed Skin
actions.description: Major Status Conditions affecting the user are cured if their duration is 2 or less turns.

actions.name: Long Reach
actions.description: Any contact attack the user knows no longer makes contact on hit, and those attacks ranges are increased by 2m.

actions.name: Heavy Metal
actions.description: The user's WC is increased by +3. The user is immune to being Pushed.

actions.name: Hyper Cutter
actions.description: The user is immune to Negative ATK stage effects. When the user would gain a Positive ATK stage effect, the duration is increased by 1 activation.

actions.name: Defiant
actions.description: The user's SPATK stage increases by +2 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Mummy
actions.description: The attacking creature's Basic Ability is replaced with Mummy until the end of combat. If the creature has more than one Basic Ability, the creature chooses which ability is replaced. A creature can only have one ability replaced with Mummy at a time.

actions.name: Magma Armor
actions.description: The user is immune to the Frozen condition. If the user is hit with a contact attack by a non Fire-type creature, the attacking creature takes a Tick of HP damage.

actions.name: Iron Fist
actions.description: The user's [Punch] attacks have 30% increased Power.

actions.name: Fur Coat
actions.description: The user takes 50% less damage from Physical-category attacks.

actions.name: Poison Touch
actions.description: When the user hits a creature with a contact attack, the targeted creature has a 30% chance of gaining Poison 5.

actions.name: Technician
actions.description: The user's attacks that are 60 power or less have 50% increased power.

actions.name: Liquid Voice
actions.description: Any [Sonic] attack the user knows has its original type changed to Water-type.

actions.name: Merciless
actions.description: If the user's attack hits a target afflicted with Poison or Blight, it is a Critical Hit.

actions.name: Dry Skin
actions.description: The user recovers 1/4 of their Max HP when hit by a Water-type attack, and recovers a tick of HP at the end of their turn in Rainy Weather. The user takes 25% more damage from Fire-type attacks, and loses a Tick of HP at the end of their turn in Sunny Weather.

actions.name: Opportunist
actions.description: The user gains the effect the triggering creature gained.

actions.name: Pickup
actions.description: The user can perform a Sprint maneuver to move towards the item. If the user is adjacent to the item at the end of this movement or when the ability is triggered, they pick up and equip the item if able. As a Downtime Action with a duration of 1 day, the user can explore the nearby area and roll their Luck. On a success, they find an item on the Pickup table. If the user is an owned Pokemon, they use their trainers Luck for the Pickup roll.

actions.name: Friend Guard
actions.description: All allies within 5m of the user takes 25% less damage from incoming attacks. The user does not benefit the effect of this ability, but can get the benefit from another creature with Friend Guard. A creature can only benefit from one instance of Friend Guard at a time.

actions.name: Flame Body
actions.description: When the user is hit by a damaging contact attack, the attacking creature has a 30% chance of being @Affliction[burn] 5.

actions.name: Sweet Veil
actions.description: The user is immune to the Drowsy and Nightmares condition. The duration of Drowsy and Nightmares affecting allied creatures within 10m of the user are reduced by 2 instead of 1 at the end of each of their activations.

actions.name: Lingering Aroma
actions.description: The attacking creature's Basic Ability is replaced with Lingering Aroma until the end of combat. If the creature has more than one Basic Ability, the creature chooses which ability is replaced. A creature can only have one ability replaced with Lingering Aroma at a time.

actions.name: Disguise
actions.description: The first time the user takes damage in combat, they take 0 damage. Afterward, this ability cannot be used again until the end of the battle.

actions.name: Zen Mode
actions.description: While the user's HP is lower than half their Max HP, the user changes to Zen forme. While in Zen Forme, the user resists all incoming damage by 1 step.

actions.name: Surge Surfer
actions.description: While Electric Terrain is active the user's Speed Stat is doubled.

actions.name: Compound Eyes
actions.description: The ACC of your attacks is increased by 30%.

actions.name: Liquid Ooze
actions.description: If the user is hit by a [Drain] attack, the attacking creature takes damage equal to the amount healed by the [Drain] attack instead of healing.

actions.name: Stench
actions.description: Whenever the user hits with a damaging move, the affected target has a 10% chance to become Flinched 5.

actions.name: Clear Body
actions.description: Your stage cannot be decreased by attack or ability effects from other creatures.

actions.name: Symbiosis
actions.description: For every active ally on the field that shares a Type with the user, the user takes 10% reduced damage from incoming attacks, to a maximum of 30% reduced damage.

actions.name: Levitate
actions.description: The user is considered Raised at all times. While Raised, the user is immune to [Earthbound] effects and attacks.

actions.name: Beads of Ruin
actions.description: All other creatures have their SPDEF stat reduced by 25%. This reduction happens before any stage changes.

actions.name: Gulp Missile
actions.description: The user changes to Gulping Form, preparing and equipping an Arrocuda for 2 activations. If the user is hit by an attack while in Gulping Form, the user retaliates against the attacker by throwing the Arrocuda at the attacker, dealing 1/4 of the attacker's Max HP as damage as well as reducing the attackers DEF stage by -1 for 5 activations. If the user's health is lower than 1/2 their Max HP, they change into Gorging Form instead and equips a Pikachu instead for 2 activations. Gorging Form's retaliation attack deals 1/4 of the attacker's health as damage and Inflicts Paralysis 5. If the user is not attacked while in either form before the duration ends, they change back to their base forme and lose the equipped Pokemon.

actions.name: Psychic Surge
actions.description: Connection - Psychic Terrain. When using Psychic Terrain, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to increase the number of rounds Psychic Terrain persists by 2.

actions.name: Desolate Land
actions.description: When the user is active on the field, the Weather is changed to (T3 Sunny). This weather persists while the user with this ability is active. When the user faints or switches out the weather will change to (T2 Sunny) for 5 rounds.

actions.name: Overcoat
actions.description: The user is immune to the negative and damaging effects of Weather. The user is also immune to [Powder] effects.

actions.name: Synchronize
actions.description: Trigger: The user is inflicted with a Major Status Condition from another creature. Effect: The triggering creature is also affected by the same Major Status Condition they inflicted on the user, if applicable.

actions.name: Scrappy
actions.description: The user's Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can hit Ghost-type creatures.

actions.name: Water Bubble
actions.description: The user reduces the damage from incoming Fire-type attacks by 50%. The user's Water-type attacks have 50% increased power. The user is immune to the @Affliction[burn] condition.

actions.name: Hustle
actions.description: The user's ATK stat is increased by 50%. The user's Physical-category attacks have 20% less ACC.

actions.name: Gale Wings
actions.description: If the user's HP is higher than 3/4 of their Max HP, all of the user's Flying-type attacks gain [Priority 1], or have their [Priority X] increased by 1. This only works on attacks whose type is originally Flying-type.

actions.name: Tera Shift
actions.description: The user enters its Terastal Forme, and this ability is replaced with Tera Shell.

actions.name: Honey Gather
actions.description: All valid creatures within 10m of the user have their EVA stage reduced by -1 for 2 activations. As a Downtime Action with a duration of 1 day, the user can explore and gather nectar from flowers in the area to create Honey. The user needs access to an Empty Bottle in order to perform this Downtime Action, or else the Honey is lost.

actions.name: Innards Out
actions.description: The user retaliates against the attacker if the attacker is within 5m, dealing damage to the attacker equal to the damage they took before fainting.

actions.name: Harvest
actions.description: The user rolls an Easy Natural World skill check and on a success recycles a copy of the consumed item and equips it. If Sunny Weather is active, this is a Second-Nature check instead. A creature with Harvest can roll this check as a Downtime Action with a 1 day duration to create a copy of any Natural [Food] item, with the difficulty changing depending on item rarity and grade.

actions.name: Tinted Lens
actions.description: The user's damaging attacks that are resisted by their targets deals double damage on hit.

actions.name: Lightning Rod
actions.description: The triggering attack hits the user instead, dealing no damage and applying no effects. Additionally, the user raises their SPATK stage by +1 for 2 activations.

cost.trigger: A creature within 10m of the user, uses an Electric-type attack.

actions.name: Volt Absorb
actions.description: The user takes no damage from the attack and is unaffected by the attack effects. Then the user recovers 1/4 of their Max HP.

actions.name: Contrary
actions.description: All Negative stage effects applied to you instead give you Positive stage for the same duration, and vice-versa.

actions.name: Swift Swim
actions.description: While Rainy Weather is active, the user's Speed Stat is doubled.

actions.name: Huge Power
actions.description: Doubles the user's ATK stat.

actions.name: Bad Dreams
actions.description: All other creatures on the field that gain the Drowsy condition instead gain the Nightmares condition

actions.name: Pastel Veil
actions.description: The user is immune to the Poison and Blight conditions. Allied creatures within 5m of the user have their Poison and Blight condition duration reduce by 2 at the end of each of their activations instead of 1.

actions.name: Motor Drive
actions.description: The user takes no damage from the triggering attack and is unaffected by the triggering attack's effect. Then the user raises their SPD stage by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Ice Body
actions.description: While Snowy Weather is active, the user recovers a tick of HP at the end of each of their activations. The user is immune to negative effects from Snow Weather.

actions.name: Anger Point
actions.description: The user gains +6 ATK stages for 5 activations.

actions.name: Multitype
actions.description: The user can equip a Type Plate item without using their Accessory Slot. The user's type changes to match the Type Plate. If the user has two different Type Plates equipped, the user gains both types. When using Judgement, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to change the damage type Judgement deals to any available type of their choosing. (Typeless is excluded from this choice)

actions.name: Cursed Body
actions.description: When the user is hit by a damaging attack, the attacking creature has a 30% chance for the triggering attack to become Disabled 5.

actions.name: Solar Power
actions.description: While Sunny Weather is active, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50%. In Sunny Weather, the user loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their activations.

actions.name: Well-Baked Body
actions.description: The user takes no damage and is unaffected by the effects of the triggering attack. Then the user's DEF Stage is increased by +2 for 2 activations.

actions.name: Insomnia
actions.description: The user is immune to the Drowsy and Nightmares condition. The user also resists Psychic-type damage from attacks.

actions.name: Sand Rush
actions.description: The user's Speed stat is doubled in Sandy Weather. The user is immune to the negative effects of Sandy Weather.

actions.name: Absorbing Down
actions.description: Your DEF stage cannot be decreased by attack or ability effects from other creatures. Whenever your DEF stage increases, the effect duration increases by 1 activation.

actions.name: Gooey
actions.description: When the user is hit by a contact attack, the attacking creature's SPD stage is lowered by -1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Magnet Pull
actions.description: Steel-type creatures within 5m of the user are Bound and Slowed.

actions.name: Rain Dish
actions.description: While Rainy Weather is active, the user recovers a Tick of HP at the end of each of their activations.

actions.name: Toxic Boost
actions.description: While the user is affected by Poison or Blight, the power of their Physical-category attacks is increased by 50%

actions.name: Anticipation
actions.description: The user targets one enemy creature on the field. The user knows the highest power attack on the target's Active attack List.

actions.name: Vessel of Ruin
actions.description: All other creatures have their SPATK stat reduced by 25%. This reduction happens before any stage changes.

actions.name: Water Veil
actions.description: The user is immune to the @Affliction[burn] condition. The duration of @Affliction[burn] affecting allied creatures within 10m of the user are reduced by 2 instead of 1 at the end of each of their activations.

actions.name: Screen Cleaner
actions.description: The triggering attack fails and is Disabled 5.

actions.name: Chlorophyll
actions.description: Your Speed stat is doubled in Sunny Weather.

actions.name: Tera Shell
actions.description: While at Full HP, all unresisted attacks targeting the user are considered to be resisted by 1 step.

actions.name: Wimp Out
actions.description: The user freely attacks up to half their movement allowance away from the attacking creature. If the user is an owned Pokemon, they may Switch out from battle as a Free Action, allowing their trainer to Switch In a replacement as a Free Action.

actions.name: Neuroforce
actions.description: The user's Super Effective attacks on other creatures deal an increased 25% damage.

actions.name: Pressure
actions.description: All enemy creatures within 10m of the user spend an additional 50% PP on all actions that use PP.

actions.name: Truant
actions.description: All of the user's attacks have the [Exhaust] trait if they do not have the trait already. All if the user's attacks that are Simple Actions are Complete Actions instead. The user cannot use [Set-Up] moves. [Exhaust] attacks have increased 25% power.

actions.name: Water Compaction
actions.description: The user gains +2 DEF stage for 5 activations.

actions.name: Parental Bond
actions.description: Whenever the user uses a damaging attack, the attack is considered to have [2-Strike]. The second hit has 75% reduced attack power. This ability does not apply to natural [X-Strike] or [Execute] attacks.

actions.name: Misty Surge
actions.description: Connection - MistyTerrain. When using Misty Terrain, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to increase the number of rounds Misty Terrain persists by 2.

actions.name: Grassy Surge
actions.description: Connection - Grassy Terrain. When using Grassy Terrain, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to increase the number of rounds Grassy Terrain persists by 2.

actions.name: Flower Gift
actions.description: While in Sunny Weather, Cherrim changes to Sunny Form Cherrim. While in Sunny Form, Cherrim raises the ATK and SPDEF of themself and allied creatures on the field by 50%.

actions.name: Intimidate
actions.description: All valid creatures within 10m of the user lose -1 ATK stage for 5 activations and gain Fear 2. The user's Intimidate Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.

actions.name: Flash Fire
actions.description: If the user is hit by a Fire-type attack, they take no damage from the attack and are not affected by the triggering attack's effect. Then, the user's Fire-type attacks have their power increased by 50% for 3 activations.

actions.name: Telepathy
actions.description: The user is unaffected by area-of-effect attacks from allied creatures. The user's area-of-effect attacks do not affect or damage allies.

actions.name: Ball Fetch
actions.description: At the end of a battle, a creature with this ability will retrieve all Throwable items that missed for their allies. The user cannot be Fainted for this ability to work.

actions.name: Snow Cloak
actions.description: While Snowy Weather is active, all incoming attacks against the user have 20% reduced ACC. The user is immune to the negative effects of Snowy Weather.

actions.name: Strong Jaw
actions.description: The user's [Jaw] attacks have 30% increased Power.

actions.name: Sheer Force
actions.description: The user's damaging attacks that apply a secondary effect on hit have 30% increased power, but can no longer apply secondary effects with moves.

actions.name: Rock Head
actions.description: The user takes no damage from [Recoil] effects.

actions.name: Prism Armor
actions.description: The user takes 40% reduced damage from incoming super effective attacks. As a Camp Action, Necrozma can fuse with Lunala or Solgaleo to change formes.

actions.name: Skill Link
actions.description: The user's [5-Strike] attacks that hit will always strike the target 5 times.

actions.name: Schooling
actions.description: While Wishiwashi's HP is higher than 1/2 their Max HP, they will be in School Forme. When Wishiwashi's HP is lower than 1/2 their Max HP, they will change to Solo Forme and have a default EVA stage of +2.

actions.name: Rattled
actions.description: The user's Speed stage increases by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Filter
actions.description: Super-effective damage against the user is reduced by 25%.

actions.name: Analytic
actions.description: Increases the power of [Delay X] actions by 30%

actions.name: Supreme Overlord
actions.description: For every creature that is Fainted in the user's own team, the user's damaging attacks have 10% increased Power, to a maximum of 60%

actions.name: Dancer
actions.description: The user immediately uses the attack without spending additional PP, selecting new targets as needed.

actions.name: Light Metal
actions.description: The user's WC is reduced by -3. The user takes reduced damage from [Earthbound] attacks by 25%.

actions.name: Rivalry
actions.description: If the user attacks another creature that shares a Type with them, the user does 20% more damage.

actions.name: Sand Force
actions.description: While Sandy Weather is active, the user's Rock-type, Ground-type and Steel-type attacks have 30% increased power. The user is immune to the negative effects of Sandy Weather.

actions.name: Moxie
actions.description: The user's ATK stage is raised by +1 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Arena Trap
actions.description: All creatures within 5m of the user are Stuck and Grounded.

actions.name: Shadow Shield
actions.description: While the user's HP is full, they take 50% reduced damage from attacks that are not Ghost or Dark-type

actions.name: Perish Body
actions.description: The user and and attacking creature gain the effect of Perish Song. This is not the same as using the attack Perish Song.

actions.name: Poison Puppeteer
actions.description: The affected creature is afflicted with Confused 5.

actions.name: Emergency Exit
actions.description: The user freely moves up to half of a Movement speed of their choice away from the attacker without triggering Interrupt Actions. If the user is an owned Pokemon, they may freely switch out and be replaced by another owned Pokemon from their party.

actions.name: Inner Focus
actions.description: The user is immune to the Flinched condition, and also is unaffected by [Social] Ability effects.

actions.name: Damp
actions.description: The triggering action fails and becomes Disabled 5 if it was a attack, or Nullified 5 if it was an ability.

cost.trigger: A creature on the field uses an [Explode] attack or ability.

actions.name: Fluffy
actions.description: The user freely moves up to half of a Movement speed of their choice away from the attacker without triggering Interrupt Actions. If the user is an owned Pokemon, they may freely switch out and be replaced by another owned Pokemon from their party.

actions.name: Wind Power
actions.description: The user's next Electric-type attack has double power. While Windy Weather is active, the user's Electric-type attacks have double power. A creature can only be affected by one instance of this ability at a time.

actions.name: Forecast
actions.description: Connection- Weather Ball. Castform's Forme changes depending on the current active weather. When using Weather Ball, the Castform can spend an additional 2 PP to add the [Blast 3] trait to the attack.

actions.name: Sticky Hold
actions.description: The user's equipped items cannot be stolen or knocked off. The user's Grapple Maneuver check has one more degree of success.

actions.name: Run Away
actions.description: The user can use the Sprint maneuver as a Simple Action. The user is immune to the Bound Condition.

actions.name: Sharpness
actions.description: All of the user's [Sharp] attacks have 30% increased power.

actions.name: Mycelium Might
actions.description: The user's Status-category attacks are always [Delay 3] actions. The user's Status-category attacks ignore the effects of other creatures [Defensive] ability effects and always apply effects.

actions.name: Comatose
actions.description: Major Status Conditions affecting the user are reduced by 2 every activation instead of 1. The user is always considered to be affected by the Drowsy condition for the application of move and ability effects. The user ignores the effects of the Drowsy condition.

actions.name: Shield Dust
actions.description: The user is immune to the secondary effects of damaging moves.

actions.name: Receiver
actions.description: The user copies 1 Ability a Fainted allied creature has and replaces Receiver with it for the rest of combat. Copied abilities with a Trigger that requires the user to switch in activate with this effect. [Legendary] and [Forme-Change] abilities cannot be copied.

actions.name: Color Change
actions.description: Your Type changes to match the Type of the triggering attack. Passive: Your Stealth skill checks have one more degree of success.

actions.name: Competitive
actions.description: Your SPATK stage increases by +2 for 5 activations.

actions.name: Trace
actions.description: The user targets 1 other creature on the field and replaces Trace with one ability the targeted creature knows until they are switched out, Faint or combat ends. If the targeted creature has more than one ability, the target chooses which ability the user copies. Trace cannot copy [Innate] abilities.

actions.name: Big Pecks
actions.description: Your Flying-type contact attacks ignore stage changes and [Defensive] attack effects on their targets.

actions.name: Aroma Veil
actions.description: You and allies within 5m of you recover from the Disabled condition, Taunt, Torment, Encore, Heal Block and the Charmed condition at twice the rate, removing 2 stacks at the end of the activation instead of 1.

actions.name: Snow Warning
actions.description: Connection - Snowscape. When the using Snowscape, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have the weather become (T2 Snowy) for 5 rounds instead of Snowy Weather.

actions.name: Good as Gold
actions.description: The user is unaffected by Status-category attacks that target it. It may still be affected by Status Conditions and other effects caused by [Weather], [Terrain], [Hazard], Physical- and Special-Category attacks, and abilities.

actions.name: Quick Feet
actions.description: The user's Speed stat increases by 50% if affected by a Major Status Condition. If the user is Paralysis, they do not get the Slowed condition.

actions.name: Stalwart
actions.description: The user is immune to the [Push] effect and cannot be affected by any forced movement. The user's Lift skill checks have one more degree of success.

actions.name: Poison Heal
actions.description: If the user is affected by the Poison or Blight condition, they recover a Tick of HP each turn instead of taking damage.

actions.name: Propeller Tail
actions.description: The user's attacks are unaffected by [Draw In] effects.

actions.name: Heatproof
actions.description: The user takes 50% reduced damage from Fire-type attacks. If the user has Burn, they only take half damage from the @Affliction[burn] damage.

actions.name: Quick Draw
actions.description: The user's [Missile] attacks can be used as a [Priority 1] Action.

actions.name: Power Construct
actions.description: When the user's current HP is lower than 1/2 their Max HP, they transform into their Complete Forme the rest of combat. The user recovers HP equal to 1/2 their Max HP after changing formes. When the user uses Core Enforcer, they recover a Tick of HP.

actions.name: Stance Change
actions.description: Connection - King's Shield. The user starts combat in Shield Forme. When the user uses a damaging attack they change to Blade Forme before attacking. When using King's Shield, the user can spend an additional 2 AP to increase their DEF and SPDEF by +1 for 2 activations.

actions.name: Vital Spirit
actions.description: The user is immune to the Drowsy condition and Nightmares. The user's ignores the effects of Weary 1.

actions.name: Punk Rock
actions.description: The user's [Sonic] attacks have 30% increased power. The user reduces the damage from incoming [Sonic] attacks by 30%.

actions.name: RKS System
actions.description: The user's Type changes to match their equipped Memory Disk. When using the attack Multi-Attack, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to make it [2-Strike].

actions.name: Anger Shell
actions.description: The user gains +1 ATK, SPATK, and SPD stages and loses -1 DEF and SPDEF stages for 5 activations.

actions.name: Neutralizing Gas
actions.description: All creatures within 5m of the user have their abilities Nullified. [Innate] Abilities are unaffected by Neutralizing Gas.

actions.name: Air Lock
actions.description: Air Lock suppresses all effects brought on by weather, including attack power increases, end-of-turn damage, ACC changes, relevant abilities and so on.

actions.name: Defeatist
actions.description: When the user's HP is lower than 1/2 their Max HP, their ATK and SPATK stats are reduced by 50% but their DEF and SPDEF Stat are increased by 50%.

actions.name: Hunger Switch
actions.description: At the end of the user's activations, they will alternate between Full Belly Mode Forme and Hangry Mode Forme. While in Full Belly Mode, consuming an equipped [Food] Item will give +1 DEF and SPDEF stages for 3 activations. While in Hangry Mode, consuming an equipped [Food] Item will give +1 ATK and SPATK stages for 3 activations.

actions.name: Teravolt
actions.description: The user's attacks are unaffected by the abilities of other creatures on the field. When using Fusion Bolt, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to also inflict Nullified 5 on one of the target's abilities. If the user uses Bolt Strike, the user may spend an additional 2 PP to inflict Nullified 5 on one of the target's abilities as well as inflicting Blinded 5.

actions.name: Unaware
actions.description: The user ignores all stage changes on other creatures on the field.

actions.name: Hadron Engine
actions.description: At the start of combat, or when the user switches in, the terrain is changed to Electric Terrain and remains Electric Terrain while the user is active on the field. Additionally, the user's SPATK stat increases by 33% while Electric Terrain is active. If the user uses Electro Drift while on Electric Terrain, their Speed stage increases by +1 for 2 activations. If the user Faints or is switched out, current active Electric Terrain lasts 3 rounds.

actions.name: Dazzling
actions.description: Other creatures' Interrupt Actions cannot be declared on the user's activations.

actions.name: Early Bird
actions.description: The user's Drowsy condition ticks down one extra Stack per Activation.

actions.name: Own Tempo
actions.description: The user is immune to the Confused condition, and also is unaffected by [Social] Ability effects.
